name: twardoch-is-coding
description: Conference talk: Coding with LLMs - Tools and Techniques for Modern Development

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd src_slides/marp && npm install && cd ../slidev && npm install && cd ../revealjs && npm install && cd ../mdx && npm install && cd ../../..
scripts.build-marp: cd src_slides/marp && npm run build && npm run build-pdf
scripts.build-slides: mkdir -p src_docs/docs/slides && npm run build-marp && npm run build-slidev && npm run build-revealjs && npm run build-mdx
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-slides && cd src_docs && mkdocs build --config-file mkdocs.yml --site-dir ../docs
scripts.dev: echo 'Choose a framework: npm run serve-marp, serve-slidev, serve-revealjs, or serve-mdx'
scripts.predeploy: npm run build-all && npm run validate

author: Adam Twardoch
